main_definition: Nearly means very close to happening or being, but not quite there yet.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Almost equal in amount or degree.
meanings_and_examples.example: I nearly finished my homework; I'm just missing one more question.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Very close to happening, but not quite there yet.
meanings_and_examples.example: We nearly missed the bus this morning by just a few seconds.

meanings_and_examples.definition: So near or like in appearance, quality, or nature; resembling greatly.
meanings_and_examples.example: The clouds were nearly identical to each other, all appearing as one large mass.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In terms of time, almost within a certain period or range.
meanings_and_examples.example: We will be arriving at the airport nearly three hours before our flight's departure.
